nodes.text: Double Cross is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on July 8, 2004 and described an encounter in a Tolea Biqua bar where a Human received some stolen data chips from the Rodian Kletoo. The chips were stolen from Nirama and were to be used by Riboga to get his revenge; however, Riboga's agent was actually double-crossing him alerting a third party to the Hutt's impending move.

In the context of the Living Force campaign, it marked the availability of the smuggling compartment as a starship upgrade, as well as causing any player-characters with certificates for "Favor of Nirama" to encounter trouble in the Cularin system.
